entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow at times early this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 21. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
